post.author: Kelly J Lee
post.content:
What's Flex?

http://www.adobe.com/products/flex/
무쟈게 뜨고 있지요?
막말로 Web aplication 쪽으로는 제일 돈 많이 버는 필드 중 하나 이기도 합니다.
참고: http://blogs.zdnet.com/Stewart/?p=540

Here's Toronto Flex Camp info:
Location: Metro Toronto Convention Centre
255 Front St. W. South Tower, Room 803

Time: 5pm Thursday, November 15, 2007
Guest Speaker: Mike Potter & Others
Topic: Toronto Flex Camp

http://www.torontoflex.com/torontoflex/index.html
post.title: Toronto Flex Camp
